short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert LinkedIn relative time to actual datetime

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn Post Time - See Real Timestamps Instead of Relative Time

Tired of seeing "2h ago" or "3d ago" on LinkedIn posts? This extension converts those vague relative timestamps into precise dates and times, helping you:

✨ Key Features:
• See exact post dates/times instead of relative times
• Choose from multiple time format options 
• Toggle between original and converted timestamps
• Hover mode to see actual time without changing the display
• Automatic timezone detection and localization

Perfect for:
• Recruiters tracking candidate activity
• Sales professionals monitoring prospect engagement  
• Content creators analyzing post timing
• Anyone who needs precise timing of LinkedIn activities

Simple, lightweight and privacy-focused - no data collection or external dependencies.

Make LinkedIn timestamps work for you! Install now to stop guessing when things actually happened.
